content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":1,"originalJapaneseLine":"　二人とも、まったねーでござるー」","translatedEnglishLine":"See you both later!"},{"lineNumber":2,"originalJapaneseLine":"しゅしゅしゅー。","translatedEnglishLine":"Whoosh whoosh whoosh."},{"lineNumber":3,"originalJapaneseLine":"あっという間にウズメは行ってしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Uzume left in the blink of an eye."},{"lineNumber":4,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Somehow..."},{"lineNumber":5,"originalJapaneseLine":"　別れ方も鈴女さんみたいに、","translatedEnglishLine":" even the way she said goodbye was like Suzume-san,"},{"lineNumber":6,"originalJapaneseLine":"　さっぱりした子でしたね……」","translatedEnglishLine":" a straightforward kind of girl...\""},{"lineNumber":7,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんなことないでござるよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's not true."},{"lineNumber":8,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ウズメは結構寂しがり屋さん」","translatedEnglishLine":" Uzume is actually quite lonely."},{"lineNumber":9,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから、次に会った時は、","translatedEnglishLine":" So, when you meet her next time,"},{"lineNumber":10,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちゃんと構ってあげてね」","translatedEnglishLine":" please make sure to pay proper attention to her.\""},{"lineNumber":11,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はあ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yeah...\""},{"lineNumber":12,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、次って……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But, the next time...?"},{"lineNumber":13,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":14,"originalJapaneseLine":"はたと、何かに気づいたように、","translatedEnglishLine":"Suddenly, as if realizing something,"},{"lineNumber":15,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなみの動きが止まる。","translatedEnglishLine":" Kanami stopped moving."},{"lineNumber":16,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かなみ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kanami.\""},{"lineNumber":17,"originalJapaneseLine":"「は、はい！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Y-yes!?\""},{"lineNumber":18,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちょびーっと、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Can I say something a little serious?"},{"lineNumber":19,"originalJapaneseLine":"　真面目な話していいでござる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that okay?\""},{"lineNumber":20,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":21,"originalJapaneseLine":"鈴女の表情が真剣なそれに変わる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suzume's expression changed to a serious one."},{"lineNumber":22,"originalJapaneseLine":"「鈴女、多分、もう少しで、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Suzume, probably very soon,"},{"lineNumber":23,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次のタイミングが来るでござる」","translatedEnglishLine":" the next timing will come.\""},{"lineNumber":24,"originalJapaneseLine":"「次っていうのは、転生の時期のこと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"By 'next,' I mean the time of reincarnation.\""},{"lineNumber":25,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So...\""},{"lineNumber":26,"originalJapaneseLine":"　もごもごもごもご」","translatedEnglishLine":"*mumbling sounds*"},{"lineNumber":27,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":28,"originalJapaneseLine":"鈴女の口をかなみが塞いだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Kanami covered Suzume's mouth."},{"lineNumber":29,"originalJapaneseLine":"「もごもご？　なんでござる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Mumbling? What's that about?\""},{"lineNumber":30,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何も言わなくていいですよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You don't have to say anything.\""},{"lineNumber":31,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いつか……またウズメちゃんと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Someday... I'll look forward to meeting Uzume-chan again."},{"lineNumber":32,"originalJapaneseLine":"　会える日を楽しみにしてます」","translatedEnglishLine":"\""},{"lineNumber":33,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":34,"originalJapaneseLine":"「鈴女を惚れさせて、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What do you plan to do, making Suzume fall in love?"},{"lineNumber":35,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうする気？」","translatedEnglishLine":" What'll you do?\""},{"lineNumber":36,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんですかそれ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What is that!?\""},{"lineNumber":37,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……かなみも立派になったでござるね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Kanami, you've grown up well.\""},{"lineNumber":38,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これなら、鈴女いつでも安心して――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"With this, Suzume can always feel at ease—\""},{"lineNumber":39,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...\""},{"lineNumber":40,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かなみ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kanami...\""},{"lineNumber":41,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},

{"lineNumber":42,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぼろりと、かなみの瞳から涙が溢れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Tears welled up and overflowed from Kanami's eyes."},

{"lineNumber":43,"originalJapaneseLine":"「かなみ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kanami.\""},{"lineNumber":44,"originalJapaneseLine":"鈴女がかなみを抱きしめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"Suzume hugged Kanami."},

{"lineNumber":45,"originalJapaneseLine":"「よしよし、いーこいーこ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There, there, good girl.\""},{"lineNumber":46,"originalJapaneseLine":"優しく背中をさすると、","translatedEnglishLine":"Gently stroking her back,"},

{"lineNumber":47,"originalJapaneseLine":"堰を切ったようにかなみの瞳から","translatedEnglishLine":"as if a dam broke, tears started flowing from Kanami's eyes,"},

{"lineNumber":48,"originalJapaneseLine":"涙が次々に溢れて、こぼれる。","translatedEnglishLine":"tears continued to overflow and spill."},

{"lineNumber":49,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……ぁ……ぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... ah... ah...\""},{"lineNumber":50,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なんで泣くでござる？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why are you crying?\""},{"lineNumber":51,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぅ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":52,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……だって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But... it's because...\""},{"lineNumber":53,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんなに違う人……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They're such different people...\""},{"lineNumber":54,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃ、ないですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":" aren't they...?\""},{"lineNumber":55,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、そーだね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that's right.\""},{"lineNumber":56,"originalJapaneseLine":"「同じなようで……違くて……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"They seem the same... but they're different..."},{"lineNumber":57,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それって……やっぱり……」","translatedEnglishLine":" and that means... after all...\""},{"lineNumber":58,"originalJapaneseLine":"「鈴女さんは……いないって……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That Suzume-san... isn't there anymore...\""},{"lineNumber":59,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん、そーだね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, that's right.\""},{"lineNumber":60,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 二人とも、まったねーでござるー」
あっという間にウズメは行ってしまった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uzume left in the blink of an eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 別れ方も鈴女さんみたいに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: even the way she said goodbye was like Suzume-san,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっぱりした子でしたね……」
「そんなことないでござるよ。
ウズメは結構寂しがり屋さん」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, when you meet her next time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちゃんと構ってあげてね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: please make sure to pay proper attention to her."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はたと、何かに気づいたように、
かなみの動きが止まる。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Can I say something a little serious?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 真面目な話していいでござる？」
鈴女の表情が真剣なそれに変わる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Suzume's expression changed to a serious one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次のタイミングが来るでござる」
「次っていうのは、転生の時期のこと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "By 'next,' I mean the time of reincarnation."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鈴女の口をかなみが塞いだ。
「もごもご？　なんでござる？」
「何も言わなくていいですよ」
「いつか……またウズメちゃんと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Someday... I'll look forward to meeting Uzume-chan again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 会える日を楽しみにしてます」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What do you plan to do, making Suzume fall in love?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……かなみも立派になったでござるね」
「これなら、鈴女いつでも安心して――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "With this, Suzume can always feel at ease—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぼろりと、かなみの瞳から涙が溢れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tears welled up and overflowed from Kanami's eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 鈴女がかなみを抱きしめる。
優しく背中をさすると、
堰を切ったようにかなみの瞳から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: as if a dam broke, tears started flowing from Kanami's eyes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 涙が次々に溢れて、こぼれる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: tears continued to overflow and spill.
"They seem the same... but they're different...

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
